dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 203 EH: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 4020 Broadway Street in Houston, Texas, as the “Benny C. Martinez Post Office Building”.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.official-title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 4020 Broadway Street in Houston, Texas, as the Benny C. Martinez Post Office Building.

section.header: Benny C. Martinez Post Office Building

subsection.text: The facility of the United States Postal Service located at 4020 Broadway Street in Houston, Texas, shall be known and designated as the Benny C. Martinez Post Office Building.

Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the facility referred to in subsection (a) shall be deemed to be a reference to the Benny C. Martinez Post Office Building.

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives July 14, 2022.
